parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: My name is Cruz Alberca Carrasco. I live in Cascapampa.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I live in the village of Cascapampa.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: So, the story of how the government came

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: to do this to us, the operation to sterilize us.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: the government to help us, just to add their grain of sand,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: Our belly hurts, our abdomen hurts, our waist.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: Just help us a little, add a grain of sand.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: Because they all came, lying to us,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: saying they would give us something,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: That’s what they said but now they don't give anything.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: Now we want help from the government,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I’m 53 now, and I can't work anymore.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: Everything they said was a lie.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: to help us out, to add just a grain of sand

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: because we can't do anything anymore.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: You could say we are useless now.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: That’s why we want help from the government.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: we ask for justice to be done.
